article_title: Employers Reining In Health Care Costs, But With A Twist

article_metadata.author: Leah Binder

og.description: The 2014 Kaiser/HRET Employer Health Benefits Survey came out last week, with the remarkable news that employers are reining in health costs. Premiums for employer-based health insurance are up an average of just 3% this year, relatively little considering the steep increases from the first decade of the century, when [...]
